genitive: masc
For nouns ending in a consonant (except й), add а
masc
For nouns ending in й or ь, replace with я or sometimes ю
masc
Some nouns ending in a consonant are exceptions, add у
fem
For nouns ending in а, replace with и
fem
For nouns ending in я or ь (feminine), replace with і
fem
For nouns ending in ія, replace with ії
fem
For nouns ending in a consonant, add і
neu
For nouns ending in о, replace with а
neu
For nouns ending in е, replace with я
neu
For nouns ending in я, no change
accusative: For animate nouns ending in a consonant (except й), add а
For animate nouns ending in й or ь, replace with я
For nouns ending in а, replace with у
For nouns ending in я, replace with ю
For nouns ending in a consonant or ь, no change
For nouns ending in о, е, or я, no change
dative: masc
For nouns ending in a consonant (except й), add у (or ові)
masc
For nouns ending in й, replace with ю (or єві)
masc
For nouns ending in ь, replace with ю (or еві)
fem
For nouns ending in а, я, ь, replace with і
fem
For nouns ending in a consonant, add і
neu
For nouns ending in о, replace with у
neu
For nouns ending in е or я, replace with ю
instrumental: masc
For nouns ending in a consonant (except й), add ом
masc
For nouns ending in й, replace with єм
masc
For nouns ending in ь, replace with ем
fem
For nouns ending in а, replace with ою
fem
For nouns ending in я, replace with ею
fem
For nouns ending in ія, replace with єю
fem
For nouns ending in ь, replace with ю (some nouns will also double the consonant)
fem
For nouns ending in a consonant, double the consonant and add ю
neu
For nouns ending in о, е, or я, add м
locative: masc
For nouns ending in a consonant (except й or к), add і
masc
For nouns ending in к, add у
masc
For nouns ending in й, replace with ї or sometimes ю
masc
For nouns ending in ь, replace with і
fem
For nouns ending in а, я or і, replace with і
fem
For nouns ending in ія, replace with ії
fem
For nouns ending in a consonant, add і
neu
For nouns ending in о, е, or я, replace with і
vocative: For nouns ending in a consonant (except ч, ш, or й), add е
For nouns ending in ч or ш, add у
For nouns ending in ь or й, replace with ю
For nouns ending in а, replace with о
For nouns ending in я, replace with е
For nouns ending in ія, replace with іє

nominative: masc
For nouns ending in a consonant (except for ж, ч, ш, щ or й), add и
masc
For nouns ending in ь, replace with і
masc
For nouns ending in ж, ч, ш, or щ, add і
masc
For nouns ending in ар or яр, add і
masc
For nouns ending in й, replace with ї
fem
For nouns ending in а, replace with и
fem
For nouns ending in я, replace with і
fem
For nouns ending in жа, ча, ша, or ща, replace а with і
fem
For nouns ending in 'я, replace with ї
fem
For nouns ending in ія, replace with ії
neu
For nouns ending in о, replace with а
neu
For nouns ending in е, replace with я
neu
For nouns ending in же, че, ше, or ще, replace е with а
neu
For nouns ending in я, no change
genitive: masc
For nouns ending in a consonant, add ів
masc
For nouns ending in я, or й, replace with ів
fem
For nouns ending in а, remove а
fem
For nouns ending in ка, replace with ок
fem
For nouns ending in я, replace with ь
fem
For nouns ending in ь, no change
fem
For nouns ending in a consonant, add ей
fem
For nouns ending in жа, ча, ша, or ща, replace а with ей
neu
For nouns ending in е, replace with ь
neu
For nouns ending in о, remove о
accusative: For inanimate nouns, the accusative plural is the same as the nominative plural
For animate nouns, the accusative plural is the same as the genitive plural
For inanimate nouns, the accusative plural is the same as the nominative plural
For animate nouns, the accusative plural is the same as the genitive plural
For inanimate and animate nouns, the accusative plural is the same as the nominative plural
dative: masc
For nouns ending in a consonant, add ам
masc
For nouns ending in й or ь, replace with ям
fem
For nouns ending in а, replace with ам
fem
For nouns ending in я, replace with ям
neu
For nouns ending in о, replace with ам
neu
For nouns ending in е, replace with ям
instrumental: masc
For nouns ending in a consonant, add ами
masc
For nouns ending in й or ь, replace with ями
fem
For nouns ending in а, replace with ами
fem
For nouns ending in ь, replace with ями
fem
For nouns ending in a consonant, add ами
neu
For nouns ending in о, replace with ами
neu
For nouns ending in е, replace with ями
locative: masc
For nouns ending in a consonant, add ах
masc
For nouns ending in й or ь, replace with ях
fem
For nouns ending in а, replace with ах
fem
For nouns ending in я, replace with ях
fem
For nouns ending in a consonant, add ах
neu
For nouns ending in о, replace with ах
neu
For nouns ending in е, replace with ях
